faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about AI Script to Video

items.title: What type of scripts can I use with WaveSpeed?
items.description: You can use scripts for promotional videos, educational content, presentations, and more. Our platform is flexible to accommodate various styles and formats.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed AI free to use?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 20 free credits daily, enabling the creation of multiple videos. Additional credits can be earned through participation in community activities. Subscription plans are available for more extensive needs.

items.title: Can I monetize the videos generated?
items.description: Absolutely! Paid users are free to use generated video content for commercial purposes. Free-tier users may use them for personal use only.

items.title: How do you ensure my script remains private?
items.description: WaveSpeed processes all scripts directly in your browser, ensuring that your content never leaves your device. Your privacy is our top priority.

footer.heading: Ready to Bring Your Scripts to Life?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience seamless video creation. No sign-up required.
